item.title: Capacitor setup in Apple M1 Mac
item.description: è¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒ macOS Big Sur 11.2.2 Xcode 12.4 Android Studio 4.1.3 node 14.16.1 Capacitor 2.4.1 Vue 3.0 Web npm install -g @ionic/cli git clone https://github.com/ionic-team/tutorial-photo-gallery-vue.git cd photo-gallery-capacitor-vue npm install ionic serve iOS ä¿®æ”¹appId git cloneä¸‹æ¥çš„ä»£ç é‡Œé¢çš„appIdæ˜¯io.ionic.demo.pg.vueï¼Œè¦æ¢æˆè‡ªå·±çš„ã€‚VS Codeæ‰“å¼€ä»£ç æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾æ›¿æ¢è¯¥appIdä¸ºæ–°çš„appIdï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚com.dc1979.capacitor.demo.vueï¼‰ å®‰è£…armç‰ˆCocoaPod å‚è€ƒçš„æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªSOï¼šhttps://stackoverflow.com/a/66556339 ç¡®è®¤å®‰è£…äº†armç‰ˆHomebrewï¼šwhich brewè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ /opt/homebrew/bin/brewã€‚ä¸æ˜¯çš„è¯å°±æŒ‰ç…§è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å»å®‰è£…armç‰ˆHomebrewï¼šåœ¨ M1 èŠ¯ç‰‡ Mac ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨ Homebrew å®‰è£…armç‰ˆrubyï¼šbrew install ruby æŠŠç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡åŠ åˆ°PATHä¸­ï¼šecho 'export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/ruby/bin:/opt/homebrew/lib/ruby/gems/3.0.0/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc Execute source ~/.zshrc or restart your shell ç¡®å®šwhich rubyè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯$(brew --prefix)/opt/ruby/bin/ruby Install CocoaPods with sudo gem install cocoapods Make sure you are using the correct pod binary by executing which pod (should be $(brew --prefix)/lib/ruby/gems/3.
